des: "Hands down, best tropical fruit punch EVER. There is a chain of fast-food restaurants in Little Rock called Mexico Chiquito; they sell the best fruit punch, and this is about as close as you can get! This recipe can also be made in two separate 1-gallon pitchers. Just divide the mixture of listed ingredients between the two pitchers and fill with water as above."
ins: Mix pineapple juice, grenadine, sugar, lemon juice, and instant tea powder together in a 2-gallon container; stir to dissolve sugar and tea powder. Add enough water to fill container; stir.
